M3-npD3lf_tr.code:
// "strudel 1.1 demo"

$: note("<d d d a a# d3 f4>*16".sub(12))
  .gain(1).s("sawtooth").fanchor(0)
  .lpf(mousex.range(0,1000)).lpenv(mousey.range(0,8))
  .ftype('ladder')
  .lpq(7).color('cyan')
  // .drive(3)
  .distort("2:.9")
  ._scope()

$: s("bd").bank('RolandTR909')
._punchcard({height:16,labels:1})


all(x=>x.color('red'))

GuopiYBlLkGe.code:
// "Underground plumber"
// @license CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
// @by Felix Roos
// @details inspired by Friendship - Let's not talk about it (1979) :)

samples({ bd: 'bd/BT0A0D0.wav', sn: 'sn/ST0T0S3.wav', hh: 'hh/000_hh3closedhh.wav', cp: 'cp/HANDCLP0.wav',
}, 'https://loophole-letters.vercel.app/samples/tidal/')

const h = x=>x.transpose("<0@2 5 0 7 5 0 -5>/2")

stack(
  s("<<bd*2 bd> sn> hh").fast(2).gain(.7),
  "[c2 a1 bb1 ~] ~"
  .echo(2, 1/16, 1)
  .slow(2)
  .note().s('square')
  .layer(h)
  .clip(.4)
  .cutoff(400).decay(.12).sustain(0)
  ,
  "[g2,[c3 eb3]]".iter(4)
  .echoWith(4, 1/8, (x,n)=>x.transpose(n*12).gain(Math.pow(.4,n)))
  .note().layer(h)
  .clip(.1)
)
  .fast(2/3)
  .pianoroll()

mc7VaN52OzQW.code:
//Made by @Shaym
//Inspired from Rhythms @by Switch Angel

const dbank = "tr909"
const melo = "gm_synth_brass_2"
setCps(140/60/4)

stack(
  sound("hh*8").gain(.2).sometimesBy(.1, x => x.ply("2 | 4")),
  sound("bd").beat("0, 7.3, 10", 16).n(irand(6).ribbon(200, 2)).bank(dbank),
  sound("sd").bank(dbank).beat("4, 12", 16),
  sound("cp!16?".degradeBy(slider(0.491, 0, 1)).ribbon(16, 2)).gain(.5),
  voicing("<C Am F G>").sound("gm_lead_1_square:1").gain(.4).slow(1),
  n("0 1 2 3 <4 5> 1 [2 5] 3").chord("<C Am F G>").sound(melo).voicing().gain(1.5)
).pianoroll()

qfMIm9CiQV_w.code:
setcps(1)
/*
  "hello world" of strudel! 
  
  feel free to comment and uncomment each block
  change some notes and numbers!
  only the lowest stack / block of code will run

  if you're on a macbook: 
    [ command + backslash / ] to comment lines in and out
    [ option + return ] to run and update code blocks
    
*/

$_: s("bd bd <bd cp> bd sd bd hh bd")

$: sound("<bd bd hh [hh hh] bd cp>").cps(5)

//s("bd hh sd hh")

$_: stack(
   s("<bd bd*2> ~"),
   s("~ sd"),
   s("~ cp ~ cp"),
   s("hh*8?"),
)

$_: stack(
   "c4(3,8) e4 f4 <d4 g4>".note(),
   "<48 52 55>".note()
)

$_: stack(
   "c4 d4 e4 <f4 g4>".note().sound("sawtooth"), 
   "<48 52 55>".note().sound("sax").clip(1)
 )



/*
  learn about mini notation, the core logic of this language:
  https://strudel.cc/learn/mini-notation
*/

// @version 1.0

r91OIFkKOghj.code:
$: stack(
 sound("~ jazz ~ [~ ~]") ,
 sound("sd hh bd hh")
)

TGOB4UO6ndFb.code:
//@title Rhythms @by Switch Angel
const dbank = "9000"
const dbank2 = "rolandtr808"
setCps(140/60/4)
$: s("ace_hh:4!16").decay(sine.fast(4).range(0.05,.14)).gain(.4).sometimesBy(.1, x => x.ply("2 | 4"))

$: s("bd!16?".degradeBy(slider(0.434,0,1)).ribbon(40,2)).n(irand(5).ribbon(200,2)).bank(dbank)._punchcard()
$: s("sd").bank(dbank).beat("4,11", 16)._punchcard()
$: s("cp!16?".degradeBy(slider(0.343,0,1)).ribbon(19,2)).gain(.5).bank(dbank2)._punchcard()
